_description: Any key with _ as prefix is ignored
Use '_' as way of commenting out
is_client - true implies action simulated from client
Absence is implied to be false
client_cmd - Command to write with args
cmd -   cmd to execute. REQ_ACTION_REQUEST does read, whereas the
args -  Args to use for cmds that sends. In case of read
if non-empty, it is the expected request to read
is_write -  true - Construct ActionRequest from data to write.
false - Expect to read match message per data
s_data -  Used for write / read verfication. Empty string implies
